Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (appKey.Length != 43) {  				UIAlertView alert = new UIAlertView () {   					Title = "App key not set"' Message = "Please set the app key in the ScanditSDKDemoViewController class."  				};  				alert.AddButton ("OK");  				alert.Show ();  			} else {  				// Prepare the picker such that it starts up faster.  				SIBarcodePicker.Prepare (appKey' SICameraFacingDirection.Back);  			}
